domain.description: Domain that this customer belongs to.

customer.description: The customer the subject belongs to

items.description: The subject's flags

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.re.description: The app notification settings set for this user.

priority.description: If set, only send app notifications for cases with these priorities.

items.description: If set, only send app notifications for cases with these priorities.

verbose.description: If true, app notifications should be verbose.

appSettings.description: The app notification settings set for this user.

user.description: The user which these settings apply to.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.re.description: Request to update current case notification settings for app notification

priority.description: If set, only send app notifications for cases with these priorities.

items.description: If set, only send app notifications for cases with these priorities.

verbose.description: If set, modify verbosity setting for app notifications.

recipients.description: The recipients that this notification sends to

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.re.description: The recipients that this notification sends to

destination.description: The destination of this recipient (email, sms or other)

items.description: The flags of this recipient

userID.description: The ID of the user this notification is bound to, or 0 if not a user

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.re.description: Request to prepare sending notifications. This is only used for API testing, and is not permitted for ordinary users.

attachments.description: Attachments to process in this notification. The notification rules and destinations will determine how these are used.

context.description: The notification context objects. The notification event determines which context objects are expected. Each object should be JSON serializable.

customerID.description: Set the customer context of this notification request. If not set, it should default to the current users customer.

event.description: The name of the notification event to trigger. This will determine notification behaviour and rules.

recipients.description: Recipients to notify, either user or non-user.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.re.description: Attachment object which is part of a NotificationRequest

contentType.description: MIME Content type of this attachment.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.re.description: Recipient object which is part of a NotificationRequest

email.description: This specifies the notification email of the recipient. Only applicable for recipients of type email, which is not connected to a user.

format.description: If applicable, format suggests the preferred notification format for this recipient. Defaults to brief.

language.description: Type specifies the preferred notification language for this recipient. Defaults to english.

name.description: This specifies the name of the recipient. Only applicable if the recipient is not referring to a user.

phone.description: This specifies the notification phone number of the recipient. Only applicable for recipients of type sms, which is not connected to a user.

role.description: This specifies the role this recipient has (why is the recipient being notified). Default is undefined.

type.description: Type specifies the preferred notification type for this recipient. Defaults to email.

userID.description: If set, this ID referse to the user to notify

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.re.description: Request to enroll a new notification device (for push notifications) for the current user

name.description: The display name of the enrolled device.

token.description: The notification token to enroll, to uniquely reference the device. This should be received from the notification service provider.

type.description: The type of device to enroll.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: If set, this rule will only match cases for one of these case categories
If set, this rule will only match cases for one of these services
Argus desktop channel settings applied by this rule

active.description: The channel activation this rule applies. If useDefault, this channel will use the users default settings.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Channel settings applied by this rule to notifications matching the rule criteria

app.description: Mobile app channel settings applied by this rule

argus.description: Argus desktop channel settings applied by this rule

email.description: Email channel settings applied by this rule

sms.description: SMS channel settings applied by this rule

caseTypes.description: If set, this rule will only match cases for one of these case types

items.description: If set, this rule will only match cases for one of these case types

categories.description: If set, this rule will only match cases for one of these case categories

channels.description: Channel settings applied by this rule to notifications matching the rule criteria

createdByUser.description: The user that created the rule

createdTimestamp.description: The timestamp when this rule was created.

customers.description: If set, this rule will only match cases for one of these case customers

deletedByUser.description: The user that deleted the rule. Not set for non-deleted rules.

deletedTimestamp.description: The timestamp when this rule was deleted. Not set for non-deleted rules.

flags.description: State flags set for this rule

items.description: State flags set for this rule

index.description: Evaluatino index of this rule, determining the evaluation order which apply to rules for a user

lastUpdatedByUser.description: The user that last updated the rule

lastUpdatedTimestamp.description: The timestamp when this rule was last updated.

operations.description: If set, this rule will only match updates to cases for one of these events

items.description: If set, this rule will only match updates to cases for one of these events

priority.description: If set, this rule will only match cases with one of these priorities

items.description: If set, this rule will only match cases with one of these priorities

services.description: If set, this rule will only match cases for one of these services

userRoles.description: If set, this rule will only match case updates for which the user role should match one of these user roles.

items.description: If set, this rule will only match case updates for which the user role should match one of these user roles.

caseTypes.description: Specify which case types should match this rule. Default is empty (match all)

items.description: Specify which case types should match this rule. Default is empty (match all)

categories.description: Specify which categories (ID or shortname) should match this rule. Default is empty (match all). Add blank category or 0 (zero) to match specifically on category not set.

items.description: Specify which categories (ID or shortname) should match this rule. Default is empty (match all). Add blank category or 0 (zero) to match specifically on category not set.

channels.description: Define actions to apply when this rule matches

customers.description: Specify which customers (ID or shortname) should match this rule. Default is empty (match all)

items.description: Specify which customers (ID or shortname) should match this rule. Default is empty (match all)

index.description: Specify the evaluation index for this rule (0-based). Default is 0, meaning that the new rule will be evaluated first.

name.description: A name for this rule. Default value is empty.

operations.description: Specify which update operations should match this rule. Default is empty (match all)

items.description: Specify which update operations should match this rule. Default is empty (match all)

priorities.description: Specify which priorities should match this rule. Default is empty (match all)

items.description: Specify which priorities should match this rule. Default is empty (match all)

services.description: Specify which services (ID or shortname) should match this rule. Default is empty (match all)

items.description: Specify which services (ID or shortname) should match this rule. Default is empty (match all)

userRoles.description: Specify which user roles should match this rule. Default is empty (match all)

items.description: Specify which user roles should match this rule. Default is empty (match all)

active.description: Specify the channel active setting this rule applies. If useDefault, this channel will use the users default settings.

app.description: If set, change the mobile app channel settings in this rule

argus.description: If set, change the argus desktop channel settings in this rule

email.description: If set, change the email channel settings in this rule

sms.description: If set, change the SMS channel settings in this rule

caseDefaultSettings.description: The default settings for case notifications

lastUpdatedByUser.description: The user that last updated these settings

lastUpdatedTimestamp.description: The timestamp when these settings were last updated

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Case notification settings for a specific notification channel

disabled.description: If true, this channel is disabled

priority.description: If set, only notifications for cases of the given priority will be sent on this channel

items.description: If set, only notifications for cases of the given priority will be sent on this channel

verbose.description: If true, verbose messages are enabled for this channel

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Case notification settings

app.description: Notification settings for the mobile app channel

argus.description: Notification settings for the argus desktop channel

email.description: Notification settings for the email channel

sms.description: Notification settings for the sms channel

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Request for updating the users case notification settings

app.description: If set, update the notification settings for the mobile channel

argus.description: If set, update the notification settings for the argus desktop channel

email.description: If set, update the notification settings for the email channel

sms.description: If set, update the notification settings for the sms channel

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Specification for the notification settings for a specific notification channel

disabled.description: If set, update the disabled state for this channel.

verbose.description: If set, update the verbose setting for this channel

priority.description: If set, update which case priorities will be notified on this channel

items.description: If set, update which case priorities will be notified on this channel

customer.description: The customer the subject belongs to

items.description: The subject's flags

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Specifies the notification channel and whether it was a success.

verbose.description: If true, the notification has been done in verbose format.

channels.description: Which notification channels will/was the receiving user attempted to be notified through.

createdTimestamp.description: Timestamp for when the notification was created.

firstSeenTimestamp.description: Timestamp for when the notification was first seen by the receiving user.

flags.description: Set of flags for the notification. Tells if the notification is seen or was suppressed.

items.description: Set of flags for the notification. Tells if the notification is seen or was suppressed.

objectCustomer.description: The customer for the object for which the notification transaction was generated

objectID.description: The identifier for the object for which the notification transaction was generated

subscriptionID.description: The ID of the watcher subscription object, if the user was notified due to a watcher subscription.

transactionID.description: Unique identifier for the parent transaction which generated this notification.

transactionUser.description: User info for the user which triggered the transaction generating this notificaiton

watcherID.description: The ID of the watcher object, if the user was notified due to a watcher record.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Context interface which is extended for specific services.

createdTimestamp.description: Timestamp for when the key was created

lastUsedClientIp.description: Last client IP which used the API-key

lastUsedTimestamp.description: Timestamp of when the key was last used. 0 if the key has never been used

Response context for SMS-token retrieval related notifications
Response context for TOTP initialization related notifications

id.description: The UUID of the case category.

additionalProperties.description: Localized names for the case category.

localizedNames.description: Localized names for the case category.

shortName.description: The shortname of the case category.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Allows us to specify which specific changes has happen to the case on an update notification.

field.description: Which case filed has been changed.

newObject.description: What is the new value. If the change is removal, this is null.

previousObject.description: What was the previous value. If added, not changed, this is null.

changes.description: List of changes to the case being notified. Only required on case update events.

description.description: Textual description of the case. Will be sanitized (HTML).  (@SafeHTML)

priority.description: Current priority of the case. Required to correctly label in the notification center.

type.description: Case type. Required to correctly label in the notification center.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Notification request context for case notifications. Used to generate notifications in the notification center.

id.description: The UUID of the case service entity.

additionalProperties.description: Localized names for the case service.

localizedNames.description: Localized names for the case service.

shortName.description: The shortname of the case service.

name.description: The file name of the attachment.

comment.description: The comment in textual form. Will be sanitized (HTML).  (@SafeHTML)

description.description: Textual description of the case. Will be sanitized (HTML).  (@SafeHTML)

fieldName.description: The name of the field descriptor.

id.description: The UUID of the field descriptor.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: What is the new value. If the change is removal, this is null.
Model describing a watcher object connected to a email address
Model describing a watcher object connected to a group
Model describing a watcher object connected to a user
Model to describe a document
Response context for document-service related notifications
Response to marking User notifications as seen

seenCount.description: Number of notifications marked as seen.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Allows current user to set Notifications to seen state

endTimestamp.description: Timestamp on the day until which to mark notifications as seen. Defaults to time of request.

notificationIDs.description: UUID of notifications to mark as seen. If empty or null, all are set to seen.

items.description: UUID of notifications to mark as seen. If empty or null, all are set to seen.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Allows current user to search for received notifications.

channels.description: Restrict search to return notifications which was attempted to send in at least one off the specified channels. Defaults to no channel restrictions.

items.description: Restrict search to return notifications which was attempted to send in at least one off the specified channels. Defaults to no channel restrictions.

endTimestamp.description: Restrict search to return notifications created before the timestamp. Defaults to now.

excludeFlags.description: Restrict search to return notifications which have the specified flags unset.

items.description: Restrict search to return notifications which have the specified flags unset.

includeContext.description: Specify if service specific notification context should be included

includeFlags.description: Restrict search to return notifications which have the specified flags set.

items.description: Restrict search to return notifications which have the specified flags set.

objectCustomer.description: Limit to notifications generated by the specified customers. Can be a list of shortnames and/or customerIDs

items.description: Limit to notifications generated by the specified customers. Can be a list of shortnames and/or customerIDs

objectID.description: Limit to notification generated by the specified set of Argus objects by their IDs

items.description: Limit to notification generated by the specified set of Argus objects by their IDs

operation.description: Limit to notifications generated by the specified Argus operations

items.description: Limit to notifications generated by the specified Argus operations

service.description: Limit to notifications generated by the specified Argus services.

items.description: Limit to notifications generated by the specified Argus services.

startTimestamp.description: Restrict search to return notifications created after the timestamp. Defaults to no restrictions.

user.description: Restrict search to return notifications generated by specified users. Can be shortnames or userIds.

items.description: Restrict search to return notifications generated by specified users. Can be shortnames or userIds.

email.description: If email type recipient, this specifies the email to notify.

format.description: The format of the notification (brief or verbose)

language.description: If email type recipient, this specifies the language to notify in.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Email type recipients, not connected to a user.

channels.description: The channel responses, describing how this recipient was or will be notified

notificationID.description: The ID of the notification entity stored for this notification. May be null for non-user notifications or unsent notifications

recipient.description: Describes the recipient of this notification, either a user or an email address

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Describes the prepared notification transaction
Describes the recipient of this notification, either a user or an email address

ruleID.description: The ID of the matching rule, or null if no rule matched.

subscriptionID.description: The ID of the watcher subscription object, if this recipient was added due to a watcher subscription.

watcherID.description: The ID of the watcher object, if this recipient was added as a watcher.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: User type recipients, connected to a single user.

email.description: If email type recipient, this specifies the email to notify.

format.description: If email type recipient, this specifies if the notification should be of a brief or verbose format.

language.description: If email type recipient, this specifies the language to notify in.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Email type recipients, not connected to a user.
Interface to be used by other services to generate notifications..

objectCustomer.description: Id or shortname for customer of the object this notification is related to.If notification is not customer relevant, this may not be set.

objectID.description: Which Argus object (case, document, sensor, asset, etc.) generated the notification. Is not required, as some operations will not have a corresponding Argus object.

recipients.description: List of user and email recipients to notify.

requestContext.description: Context interface which is extended for specific services.

triggeringUser.description: Id of user who generated this notification is related to.If null, current user will be extracted from request context.

channels.description: If set, this request allows overriding settings for specific channels. Default is not set, which will select all channels based on user settings.

subscriptionID.description: The ID of the watcher subscription object, if this recipient was added due to a watcher subscription.

user.description: Shortname or UserID of the user to notify. Set if User type recipient.

watcherID.description: The ID of the watcher object, if this recipient was added as a watcher.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: User type recipients, connected to a single user.
If set, this request allows overriding settings for specific channels. Default is not set, which will select all channels based on user settings.

state.description: The requested state for this channel. Default is 'useDefault', which will apply user settings/rules.

verbose.description: If set, override verbosity settings for this channel.

createdByUserID.description: Id of the user who created the key

createdTimestamp.description: Timestamp for when the key was created

lastUsedClientIp.description: Last client IP which used the API-key

lastUsedTimestamp.description: Timestamp of when the key was last used. 0 if the key has never been used

userId.description: Id of the user owning the key

enrollmentCode.description: Enrollment code to be sent to the user

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Request context for enrollment notifications

providerLink.description: Link to the for the provider. Null/empty if the provider is unknown

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Request context for OpenID related notifications

createdTimestamp.description: Timestamp for when the key was enrolled

userID.description: Id of the user owning the key

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Request context for public-key enrollment related notifications

timestamp.description: Timestamp for when the SMS token was retrieved

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: Request context for SMS token related notifications

timestamp.description: Timestamp for when the TOTP was initialized

Common model to describe a category
Allows us to specify which specific changes has happen to the case on an update notification.

newObject.description: What is the new value. If the change is removal, this should be null.

previousObject.description: What was the previous value. If added, not changed, this should be null.

changes.description: List of changes to the case being notified. Only required on case update events.

description.description: Textual description of the case. Will be sanitized (HTML). Only expected on created case notifications.

priority.description: Current priority of the case. Required to correctly label in the notification center.

type.description: Case type. Required to correctly label in the notification center.

userRole.description: The role of the user producing the change.

comment.description: The comment in textual form. Will be sanitized (HTML).

internal.description: If the comment is an internal comment. Defaults to false.

description.description: Textual description of the case. Will be sanitized (HTML).

fieldName.description: The name of the field descriptor.

id.description: The UUID of the field entity.

no.mnemonic.services.notification.spi.v2.description: What is the new value. If the change is removal, this should be null.

watcher.description: User id, group id or destination (email) affected

watcherType.description: Type of watcher. Informs if watcher is group, user or email.

Describes the sent notification transaction

caseTypes.description: If set, update which case types should match this rule. Use empty set to reset to empty (match all).

items.description: If set, update which case types should match this rule. Use empty set to reset to empty (match all).

categories.description: If set, update which categories (ID or shortname) should match this rule. Use empty set to reset to empty (match all). Add blank category or 0 (zero) to match specifically on category not set.

items.description: If set, update which categories (ID or shortname) should match this rule. Use empty set to reset to empty (match all). Add blank category or 0 (zero) to match specifically on category not set.

channels.description: Update actions to apply when this rule matches. If not set, no actions are changed.

customers.description: If set, update which customers (ID or shortname) should match this rule. Use empty set to reset to empty (match all).

items.description: If set, update which customers (ID or shortname) should match this rule. Use empty set to reset to empty (match all).

index.description: If set, change the rule evaluation index for this rule (0-based). This will reorder all other rules.

name.description: If set, update the rule name

operations.description: If set, update which operations should match this rule. Use empty set to reset to empty (match all).

items.description: If set, update which operations should match this rule. Use empty set to reset to empty (match all).

priorities.description: If set, update which case priorities should match this rule. Use empty set to reset to empty (match all).

items.description: If set, update which case priorities should match this rule. Use empty set to reset to empty (match all).

services.description: If set, update which services (ID or shortname) should match this rule. Use empty set to reset to empty (match all)

items.description: If set, update which services (ID or shortname) should match this rule. Use empty set to reset to empty (match all)

userRoles.description: If set, update which user roles should match this rule. Use empty set to reset to empty (match all).

items.description: If set, update which user roles should match this rule. Use empty set to reset to empty (match all).
